projects.title: Soundscape
projects.tech: React, Node js, Express, MongoDB, Ffmpeg
projects.description: KeyMorphix is a wireless keyboard app built in Kotlin that allows users to control their Windows PC using their mobile phone. The app connects via WebSockets to a server app installed on the PC, transforming your phone into a full-functioning keyboard and touchpad.

projects.title: CodeShare - real-time code editor
projects.tech: React, Node js, Express, MongoDB, Socket.io
projects.description: Codeshare is a real-time collaborative code editor that enables multiple developers to write and edit code simultaneously on the same file. Leveraging WebSockets for real-time communication, it allows users to see live changes made by other collaborators, making it an ideal tool for pair programming or group coding sessions. The app is built using React for the frontend and Node.js with MongoDB for the backend, ensuring smooth user experience and data management.

projects.title: Chatcord
projects.description: ChatCord is a real-time messaging application similar to Slack or Discord, allowing users to communicate in real time via text-based chat. Built using React for the user interface, it integrates Firebase for authentication and uses Firebase Realtime Database to provide a seamless, fast, and reliable chat experience. SCSS is used for styling, ensuring a responsive and visually appealing design. Firebase Authentication ensures secure user login and registration.

projects.title: Nabha Aircon
projects.description: Nabhas Aircon Pvt. Ltd is a company specializing in air conditioning solutions. It is built using React for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend. It features a responsive design for seamless user experiences, dynamic routing to showcase products efficiently, and an integrated Nodemailer setup for smooth email communication.

projects.title: 22 Records
projects.description: â€‹22 RECORDS is a music distribution and production company dedicated to helping artists share their music globally. They offer services that place artists' music on various digital platforms worldwide, aiding in career progression and revenue generation.

projects.title: Takenote Cloud
projects.description: Takenotes Cloud is a Progressive Web App (PWA) integrated with Firebase, allowing users to add, edit, and access notes from anywhere. It features adaptive dark mode, search functionality, color-coded notes, and a responsive design for both desktop and mobile. Notes are securely stored in Firebase Realtime Database for real-time access.
